project.title: Example 1
project.description: This is a MERN Fullstack project with authentication and CRUD functionality.

screenshots.description: Homepage with navbar and hero element.
Homepage. Carousel with 3 top-rated products and general product listing.

project.content:
## Description This is a MERN Fullstack project with authentication and CRUD functionality. ## Key takeaways Context #### Code Example Combines all reducers and apply thunk (middleware that allows you to return functions).
View code ```js const reducer = combineReducers({ productList: productListReducer, }); ```
